Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

2 Avacados
0.75 Kosher Salt
0.5 Lime
0.66 Red Onion and wash
2 Serrano Chillis and wash
2 Cilantros and wash
0.25 Black Pepper
0.5 Roma Tomato and wash
0.5 Scallion and wash

Recipe

Cut 2 Avacados and place in glass bowl
Put 0.75 x (1 tsp) Kosher Salt in bowl
Mash avacado with fork
Mince 0.66 x (1 Cup) Red Onion and put in bowl
Mince 2 Serrano Chillis and put in bowl
Chop 0.5 Scallion and put in bowl
Mince and deseed and depulp 0.5 Roma Tomato and put in bowl
Put 2 x (1 tbsp) Cilantros in bowl
Squeeze 0.5 Lime into bowl
Put 0.25 x (1 tsp) Black Pepper
Stir bowl
